content.body: is there any motivation to pick back up this PR? <https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/pull/2193> ? It seems like it's pretty clear that a 'web reality' change is needed, especially given that it's a 0.08%-er on <https://chromestatus.com/metrics/feature/timeline/popularity/1764>. It looks like SpiderMonkey had some tests added that reflected the web reality, but they were reverted in test262?
